title: Browser based - browsers supported
mainAdvice: Answer the following questions about your browser based Solution
additionalAdvice: This information will be visible to buyers on your Solution page.

supported-browsers.mainAdvice: What browsers are supported? Select all that apply*
supported-browsers.additionalAdvice: If your Solution is browser based, please select below all the browsers your Solution supports.

mobile-responsive.additionalAdvice: Please select below if the design responds and adapts to mobile or tablet devices.
